overview: ILLEGAL CIVILIZATION  The Third Episode of Illegal Civilization's Summer of '17. For many young people, summer in the suburbs is its own little universe. During this precious chunk of time off from school, adults are often out of sight, even further out of mind, and friends become the most important people on the planet. As you skate, swim, or chill through the days, there’s the opportunity of getting to know your pals — and yourself — better than ever.
title: Illegal Civilization - "Summer of '17" - Episode 3
